document_data.name: City Guard of Umara
document_data.mainbody: The '''City Guard''' of the [[Free Cities of Zakhara|Free City]] of [[Umara]] served as a police force within the city as well as a standing army for the "City of Knights".
document_data.Organization: The composition of the city guard as of {{Yearlink|1367}}{{AQ-time}} was 3,000 elite warriors of the [[Astok]] tribe, 2,000 mercenaries, four units of [[mamluk]]s numbering 500 soldiers each, 600 cavalry, 2,000 local militia, and a navy consisting of 6 ships. The Atoki warriors served as the palace guard.
document_data.Activities: The ships of the navy patrolled [[Al-Yatir River]] and the coast of the [[Great Sea]].
